shortDescription: Fifteen years ago we lost track of a facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence believed it had been permanently shut down. A month ago, an orbiting spy satellite picked up signs that the facility had been brought back online. Our current guess is that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was dispatched to bring the base back up to operational capacity. We'd rather not have sensitive radar backed by armed turrets and flak batteries aimed at the skies of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We'd like you to clear their team out and hold the facility while our own people land to scour it for useful intel.
longDescription: Turrets always make things more complicated, but this seems like a pretty routine operation, Commander.

objectiveList.title: Scout the Base
objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Enemy Force
objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

objectiveList.title: Hold Out as Enemies Counter Attack
objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

objectiveList.title: Pacify the Area around the Base
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate Base Turrets
objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

dialogueContent.words: Commander, we're in the AO. I'm seeing those turrets we were promised, but no sign of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team that's supposed to be here.
We have to assume they're out on patrol. Commander, this position should give you a decent view of the facility and the turrets. Move up and see what we're facing.
I could do without the giant ego that mercenary seems to carry around everywhere.
Sorry, Sumire, I don't speak Pot or Kettle.
Well, that was a lot more exciting than we bargained for.
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
Getting an active ping from the turrets. I'm going to get some altitude so I don't get any more bullet holes in my Leopard.
We need to clear those turrets out if we're going to hold the base, Commander.
There's the facility. Still no sign of the opfor, Meyer?
I... Yeah, I've got something. Multiple engine signatures. 'Mechs, inbound to your location.
Ah. I prefer opposition that isn't the usual local idiots. Are you local idiots? I suppose we'll find out.
Ha! You must be the janitor they sent to turn the lights back on.
I prefer to think of myself as a facility management professional.
